name: Summon Nature's Ally VII
text: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 7th-level creature, 1d3 6th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘召唤自然盟友I’，不过你能够召唤一个7环生物、1d3个6环的同类生物、或者1d4+1个更低等环且同一种类的生物。
